content: **crocheted wreath in drops safran the piece is worked back and forth with treble crochets theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #dropspeppermintjoy drops design pattern e-383 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **size** the spiral measures approx width = 1½ cm length = 10 cm the wreath measures approx 6 cm in diameter when assembled **yarn** drops safran from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50 g colour 18 off white 50 g colour 20 cherry 1 wreath weighs approx 4 g **buttons** drops button no 805 1 item per wreath **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 3 mm **crochet gauge** 24 treble crochets in width and 13 row in height with hook size 3 mm = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
